alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Idaho and southern Clearwater Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 258 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Kamiah, or near Kamiah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. Brief but heavy rain potentially causing flooding in poor drainage areas. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kooskia, Lowell, East Kamiah, Glenwood and Syringa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
